wikipedia_page.main: Susan Jane Richardson (born 26 January 1955) is a female English former competitive swimmer.

response: Susan Richardson (born March 11, 1952) is a retired American actress, best known for her role as Susan Bradford on the television series Eight Is Enough, which she played from 1977 to 1981.
